00126 typedef struct vocMsg {
00127     int         type;                   /* message type                 */
00128 
00129     ObjectID    objId;                  /* for CALL messages            */
00130     char        method[SZ_METHOD];
00131     int         nparams;                
00132 
00133     int         status;                 /* for RESULT messages          */
00134     int         restype;                
00135     int         nitems;         
00136 
00137     char        msgclass[SZ_CLASS];        /* for MESSAGE messages         */
00138     char        msgstr[SZ_MSGSTR];
00139 
00140     char        message[SZ_MSGBUF];     /* fully formed message         */
00141 } vocMsg_t;
00142

00145 typedef struct vocRes {
00146     int         status;                 /* result status                */
00147     int         type;                   /* type of result value         */
00148     int         nitems;                 /* no. of returned items        */      
00149     char        value[MAX_VALUES][SZ_MSGSTR];   /* value strings        */
00150 
00151     void        *buf;                   /* bulk data buffer             */
00152     int         buflen;                 /* length of buffer             */
00153 } vocRes_t;

00156 typedef struct VOClient {
00157     char   *server_host;                /* socket to DALServer          */
00158     char   *runid;                      /* RUNID logging string         */
00159     int     server_port;
00160     int     io_chan;
00161 
00162     int     msg_port;                   /* asynch message socket        */
00163     int     msg_chan;
00164 
00165     int     onetrip;                    /* private invocation flag      */
00166     int     debug;                      /* debug flag                   */
00167     int     quiet;                      /* suppress output?             */
00168     int     use_cache;                  /* use cached results?          */
00169     int     use_runid;                  /* use RUNID parameter?         */
00170 
00171 } VOClient, *VOClientPtr;
